data.question: Who is the father of C language?
Which of the following is not a valid C variable name?
All keywords in C are in ____
Which of the following is true for variable names in C?
data.a: They can contain alphanumeric characters as well as special characters
data.b: It is not an error to declare a variable to be one of the keywords(like goto, static)
data.c: Variable names cannot start with a digit
data.d: Variable can be of any length

data.question: Which of the following cannot be a variable name in C?
What is short int in C programming?
data.a: The basic data type of C
data.c: Short is the qualifier and int is the basic data type

data.question: Which of the following declaration is not supported by C language?
Which keyword is used to prevent any changes in the variable within a C program?
What is the result of logical or relational expression in C?
data.c: 0 if an expression is false and any positive number if an expression is true
